item.description:
Description -

Join the local ASPP (American Society of Picture Professionals) chapter as they hear about what's happening with the different stock image pricing models out there. Share what you are hearing from your clients and how they are dealing with the on-going effort to obtain quality images that work for their budgets.



RSVP to --

Deborah Nicholls at dnicholls@comcast.net
or
ASPP New England Evite at http://tinyurl.com/m9...



When/Where -

Thursday, October 8, 2009 6:00 - 8:30 pm
Pearson Education, 501 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116 - 9th Floor Cafeteria



Admission fee -

$5.00 fee for non-ASPP members



Panelists --

Pat Hunt, Managing Director of Huntstock

Pat Hunt is a writer and workshop leader for the stock photo industry, and Managing

Director of Huntstock in Boston, a royalty-free lifestyle production company.

www.huntstock.com
Rob Sylvan, Site Director for Istockphoto.com

Rob is a photographer, trainer, author, and Web developer. In addition to being

NAPP's Lightroom Help Desk Specialist, Rob also writes the "Under the Loupe"

column for Photoshop User magazine www.istockphoto.com
Chris Kenneally, Director, Author, Creative Relations, CCC

At Copyright Clearance Center, Chris is responsible for organizing and hosting programs that address the business needs of authors and publishers. He will be speaking on behalf of www.ozmo.com
Jean Howard, Account Executive, Editorial Sales for Aurora Photos

Jean entered the stock photography world at Stock, Boston where she became the Manager of Research and Editing. She has been with Aurora since the summer of 2003. www.auroraphotos.com
John Griffin, CEO, Cutcaster

John founded Cutcaster in 2008, a community based marketplace for buying, selling and requesting digital media content.

www.cutcaster.com
Mark Ippolito will serve as our Moderator

Mark has held senior leadership positions with Digital Railroad, Getty Images, Corbis, PhotoDisc, and Comstock. In January, 2009 he founded a consulting services in marketing and business development for clients in digital media and online advertising. www.shabustation.com

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Stock Licensing & Pricing: Getting the Right Picture at the Right Price (ASPP)
